name: Preschool (2.5 - 5 Years Old)
description: Preschool for children 2.5 - 5 years of age. This is the earliest offering of their academic programs which emphasize the mastery of reading, writing, oral communication, math and the cognitive skills as well as the disciplines of science, history, social studies, music, art, and physical education. Students will also be taught Chinese (Cantonese).

howToGetIt: - Tours are required - schedule reservation. - If you have any questions, please submit an inquiry form or call at 415-587-7256. - To apply use online form.
cost: This is a fee based service
